title: "D&D is Definitely Group Therapy" - With Cosmic Stew & Shoot the Flick
itunes:title: "D&D is Definitely Group Therapy" - With Cosmic Stew & Shoot the Flick
description:
Today the Halflings have a whole bunch of amazing guests. First up, epic content creators, Cosmic Stew will be diving into their work & discussing the important topic of allyship. Then stay tuned as we get hyped with Frankie & Scott of Shoot the Flick, as we recast Back to the Future in our lastest Wiz Of The Rings.


Get more Cosmic Stew in your life:

Twitter @CosmicStewRPG

Instagram @cosmicstewrpg

patreon.com/cosmicstew


Love Movies, Love Shoot the Flick:

Twitter @ShoottheFlick

Instagram @shoottheflick


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
